metadata.description: This anthology features all-new stories set in Deadworld universe! In "The Quest", a woman searches for her husband even though he's a zombie. "The Coming of the Queen" reveals an old woman who somehow keeps zombies away. "Full English Breakfast" shows the horror on the other side of the Atlantic, plus many other stories. As a bonus, Mark Bloodworth presents a gallery of "The Women of Deadworld" which spotlights both the living, the dead, and the in-between.
metadata.name: Deadworld: Chronicles
